title: Nanopunk
description: What if Earth froze over and you lost your family, your friends... What if you could hack into any network in the world.... What if MI6 and a ruthless Private Military Corporation were after you - Dead or alive... When Alister discovers his sister, the last of his family is alive, kidnapped, he sets off to find her. But his search quickly becomes a deadly chase after he hacks into Government Systems looking for clues. With Secret Services and a ruthless private security firm hunting him, it only gets worse when cyber-militants offer to help. And that's just the beginning.Why not check it out or add it to your shelf. It's a great read!
author: Nathan McGrath
